content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can we assist you with your electrical needs today?
Hi, I have some electrical issues I'd like to get fixed. Can I schedule an appointment?
Great to hear that. May I have your name, please?
Thank you, Margaret. Could you please provide your address so I can confirm our service availability in your area?
Thank you. Let me check if that address is within our service area.
We service your area, Margaret. When would be your ideal time for the appointment?
Honestly, I'm quite busy this month and won't be able to fit anything in. So I have to decline scheduling right now.
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month

content: I understand, Margaret. If your schedule opens up or you need assistance later, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer too busy to schedule this month
